document_data.name: Braelen Hatherhand
document_data.mainbody: '''Braelen Hatherhand''' was a boy in [[Red Larch]] and a son of a member of the [[Believers]] in the 1490s DR.
document_data.History: In [[1491 DR]], his father put him in the [[Tomb of Moving Stones]] as punishment for failed to deliver a message to [[Ilmeth Waelvur]]. Here he was found by some adventurers who were investigating in the village.
